item.title: blogging
item.description: 1 jawatech.github.io 1.1 org2blog/org2blog: Blog from Org mode to WordPress. 1.2 novoid/lazyblorg: Blogging with Org-mode for very lazy people 1.3 bastibe/org-static-blog: A static site generator using org-mode 1.3.1 AlBasmala: Blogging with Emacs & Org-mode (•̀ᴗ•́)و 1.4 Build Your Website with Org Mode - System Crafters 1.5 Blog 的搭建及其特性 1.6 使用 Emacs org-mode + GitHub Pages 来写博客 - Jiayuan’s Blog - 开发者头条 2 Blogging with org-mode and ox-hugo 3 Hugo 4 org-mode + Gatsby 5 博客写作流程之工具篇： emacs, orgmode, hugo & ox-hugo 6 博客由 Hexo 迁移至 Hugo 6.

item.title: sequenceDiagram–字體顏色由span>fill指定，顯示正常!!
